original_text: And he took with him Peter and James and John, and began to be greatly distressed and troubled.
korean_text: 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리고 가실새 심히 놀라시며 슬퍼하사

sentences.original_text: And he took with him Peter and James and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리고 가셨다

sentences.original_text: and began to be greatly distressed and troubled.
